snippet: A Raleigh man faces up to 15 years in federal prison over plans to travel to either Syria or Yemen to join a jihadist group.
abstract: Raleigh, NC, man Akba Jihad Jordan pleads guilty to conspiracy charge and faces up to 15 years in federal prison over plans to travel to either Syria or Yemen to join a jihadist group.
lead_paragraph: A Raleigh man faces up to 15 years in federal prison over plans to travel to either Syria or Yemen to join a jihadist group.

headline.main: North Carolina: Man Pleads Guilty in Terror Case
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Man Pleads Guilty in Terror Case
